The user creates a giant flamed pheasant that they direct at a target. In ''[[Boruto: Naruto the Movie]]'', the pheasant merely grapples with [[Naruto Uzumaki]]'s [[Tailed Beast Mode]] until it is torn apart by Naruto. In the ''Boruto'' anime, it explodes on impact with its target, doing extensive damage to the surroundings.<ref>''Boruto episode 62 ''</ref>

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the movie and manga, this technique was named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]''.
* Momoshiki's ability to create a pheasant, [[Inukaitakerunomikoto|dog]] and [[Monkey Rock|monkey]] is influenced by the tale of [[wikipedia:Momotarō|Momotarō]], who befriends the three animals.
** If this technique were to follow the same naming format as [[Inukaitakerunomikoto]], it would be named {{translation|Tometamaominomikoto|留玉臣命|Resolute Jewel Loyal Lord}}, after Tamaomi Tome, one of the three retainers in the legend of [[Wikipedia:Kibitsuhiko-no-mikoto|Kibitsu Hiko no Mikoto]].
